hero.title: Tegura ahazaza hawe: Ihugure mu bushabo bwa kawa
hero.subtitle: Kuva ku kanyamatsiko kugeza ku gikombe, no kuva mu mahugurwa kugeza ku kazi. Injira mu kigo cya mbere cy'amahugurwa mu Rwanda kugira ngo ubone ubumenyi bwa barista ku rwego rw'isi n'ubufasha mu mwuga ukeneye kugira ngo utsinde.

benefits.title: Kuki wahitamo Usafi Barista Training Center?
benefits.subtitle: Ntabwo dutanga impamyabumenyi gusa; dutanga inzira igana ku mwuga.

item1.title: Gahunda yuzuye
item1.description: Iga ku nzobere nka Sandrine Gasarasi na Ishimwe Ebenezer. Gahunda yacu ikubiyemo byose, kuva ku mateka ya kawa kugeza ku gucunga ubucuruzi bwa kawa, dushaka ko uba witeguye isoko.

item2.title: Uburyo bwo kwiga bworoshye
item2.description: Iga mu buryo bukwaniye. Hitamo gahunda yacu ibera Rubangura Plaza kugira ngo wige mu buryo bw'ibikorwa, cyangwa ukoreshe urubuga rwacu rwa E-learning wige aho ariho hose kandi igihe cyose ubitangiye.

item3.title: Ubufasha nyabwo mu mwuga
item3.description: Ntabwo twigisha gusa; duhuza abantu n'akazi. Bona amahirwe yo kwimenyereza umwuga mu mahoteli n'amaresitora akomeye, amakuru y'akazi binyuze mu muryango wa Usafi, no gutegurwa kubazwa akazi.

hero.title: Gushyigikira ubuziranenge bwa kawa mu Rwanda.
hero.description: Iherereye mu mutima wa Rubangura Plaza, Usafi Barista Training Center ntabwo ari ishuri gusa; ni irembo ry'iterambere mu mwuga w'amahoteli. Duhuza ibyifuzo n'umwuga, tugaha abifuza kuba aba barista ubumenyi, ubumenyi bw'ubucuruzi, n'icyizere gikenewe kugira ngo batsinde mu isi ya kawa.

mission.title: Inshingano yacu
mission.description: Guha abantu ubumenyi bwa barista ku rwego rw'isi n'ubutumwa bw'ubucuruzi bw'ibikorwa, tubahuza n'amahirwe y'akazi arambye n'ubushabitsi mu rwego rwa kawa rurimo gukura cyane.

vision.title: Icyerekezo cyacu
vision.description: Kuba ahantu ha mbere mu kwiga kawa mu Rwanda, twubaka ireme rya serivisi n'ubuziranenge bwa kawa mu karere kose.

director.name: Sandrine Gasarasi
director.description: Nk'umuyobozi wa Usafi, Sandrine ahagarariye ubuziranenge n'intsinzi y'abanyeshuri. Ayobowe na we, ikigo nticyibanda gusa ku gukora igikombe cya kawa cyiza, ahubwo no kubaka imico n'imyitwarire y'abanyamwuga ba barista.

mentorship.title: Ubujyanama bw'inzobere
mentorship.description: Itsinda ryacu ry'amahugurwa, riyobowe n'abanyamwuga bafite inararibonye nka Ishimwe Ebenezer, ryamamaza imyaka myinshi y'ubumenyi mu rwego rw'akazi mu ishuri. Ntabwo twigisha inyigisho gusa; dusangira ubumenyi bw'ibikorwa, tekiniki, n'ibanga ry'umwuga utashobora kubona mu bitabo.

represent.title: Icyo duhagarariye
represent.description: "Usafi" bivuze isuku, ubuziranenge, n'indashyikirwa. Duhagarariye igisekuru gishya cy'aba barista basobanukiwe ko kawa ari ubuhanzi. Kuva ku isuku n'umutekano kugeza kuri latte art igezweho, abanyeshuri bacu barangiza biteguye gukora mu mahoteli, amaresitora, n'ama-café akomeye.

cta.title: Witeguye kwinjira mu muryango wa Usafi?

courses.title: Amasomo ya Barista y'Abanyamwuga
courses.subtitle: Hitamo uburyo bwo kwiga buhuye n'uburyo ubayeho n'intego zawe z'umwuga.

onsite.title: Kwiga mu kigo (On-site)
onsite.description: Byiza ku banyeshuri bashaka kwimenyereza cyane ibikorwa bakoresha ibikoresho by'abanyamwuga.
features: Gukoresha imashini za espresso n'imashini zisya kawa
Guhabwa amakuru kuri latte art ako kanya

online.title: Kwiga mu buryo bw'ikoranabuhanga (E-Learning)
online.description: Byiza ku banyeshuri bafite akazi kenshi cyangwa ababa kure ya Kigali.

curriculum.title: Ibikubiye mu masomo
curriculum.description: Waba wize kuri interineti cyangwa mu kigo, gahunda yacu ikubiyemo iby'ingenzi bigize umwuga wa kawa.

m1.title: Intangiriro ya kawa
m1.description: Amateka ya kawa, amoko y'ibishyimbo (Arabica vs Robusta) n'uburyo itunganywamo.

m2.title: Ubumenyi bw'ibanze n'ibikoresho
m2.description: Gusobanukirwa imashini ya espresso, kuyitunganya, n'uburyo bwo gukora kawa.

m3.title: Espresso n'imikoreshereze y'amata
m3.description: Gutegura espresso nziza no gukora ifuro ry'amata neza.

m4.title: Latte Art
m4.description: Uburyo bwo gushushanya ku kawa (hearts, rosettes, tulips).

m5.title: Isuku n'imunganyirize y'ibikoresho
m5.description: Uburyo bwo gukora isuku ku mashini n'amategeko y'umutekano mu kazi.

m6.title: Serivisi k'abakiriya
m6.description: Kubonera abakiriya, imyitwarire icunguye, n'uburyo bwo kubakiriza neza.

m7.title: Indushyi: Ubucuruzi bwa kawa
m7.description: Gupanga ubucuruzi, gushyiraho ibiciro, kwamamaza, n'inama zo gutangira.

notes.title: Inyandiko z'umunyeshuri
notes.description: Abanyeshuri bose bahabwa inyandiko muri PDF zikubiyemo ubumenyi bwa barista, serivisi, isuku, n'inama z'ubucuruzi.
notes.badge: Shobora kuzisoma kuri interineti cyangwa kuzibika muri terefone/mudasobwa.

cert.title: Impamyabumenyi yemewe
cert.description: Umaze gusoza amasomo neza (no gutsinda ibizamini by'ibikorwa n'inyigisho), uhabwa impamyabumenyi na Usafi Barista Training Center.
cert.badge: Ikimenyetso cy'ubunyamwuga cyo gushyira kuri CV yawe.

cta.title: Witeguye gutangira gutunganya kawa?
cta.description: Imyanya mu kigo iragenda ishira mu buryo bwihuse. Bika umwanya wawe uyu munsi cyangwa utangire kwiga kuri interineti ako kanya.
cta.questions: Ufite ibibazo ku bijyanye n'uburyo bwo kwishyura?

contact.title: Twandikire
contact.subtitle: Tunezezwa no kumva ibitekerezo byanyu
contact.description: Waba ufite ikibazo ku masomo yacu, ukeneye ubufasha mu kwiyandikisha, cyangwa ushaka gusura ishuri, itsinda ryacu rirahari kugira ngo rihugure.

careerSupport.title: Tangira urugendo rw'umwuga
careerSupport.subtitle: Kure ya Impamyabumenyi: Inzira yawe igana ku ntsinzi mu mwuga
careerSupport.description: Muri Usafi Barista Training Center, imyiyandikishirize yacu ntirangira isomo rirangiye. Dutanga uburyo bukomeye bwo gufasha abanyeshuri kuva mu mahugurwa bakajya mu kazi cyangwa bakitangirira ubucuruzi.

internship.title: Kwimenyereza Akazi (Internship)
internship.description: Amahugurwa yunganirwa no kwimenyereza mu kazi nyirizina. Gahunda yacu igushyira mu rwego rw'akazi aho ushobora gukoresha ubumenyi bwawe no kubonana n'abanyamwuga.

requirements.title: Ibisabwa
list: Kwiga neza no gutsinda mu gihe cy'amahugurwa.

partnerships.title: Ubufatanye
partnerships.description: Usafi Barista Training Center ifitanye n'ubufatanye n'ama-café, amahoteli, n'ama-restaurant akomeye mu mujyi wa Kigali kugira ngo abahe abanyeshuri bo kwimenyereza no gukora.

howToApply.title: Uburyo bwo gusaba
howToApply.description: Kwimenyereza akazi biterwa n'imyanya ihari. Abanyeshuri bagomba kuzuza fomu kandi bagahagarara imbere y'akanama kababaza kugira ngo bahabwe umwanya.

cv.title: Kwangura CV n'Ibaruwa yo Gushaka Akazi
cv.description: Habwa ubufasha mu kwandika CV nziza ihuje n'umwuga w'amahoteli. Dutanga kandi amabaruwa ashimagiza abanyeshuri bitwaye neza.

alerts.title: Amakuru y'akazi
alerts.description: Bona amakuru y'akazi binyuze mu rwego rwacu rwihariye no m'imbuga nka WhatsApp za Usafi. Iga uburyo bwo gukoresha LinkedIn mu gushaka akazi.

interview.title: Gutegura kubazwa akazi
interview.description: Iga uburyo bwo gukora ubushakashatsi, imyambarire ikwiye, n'itumanaho ryiza. Reba video z'uburyo abantu babazwa akazi kugira ngo witegure neza.

certificates.title: Impamyabumenyi zanjye
certificates.subtitle: Reba ukanitahurira impamyabumenyi watsindiye.
certificates.subtitle_alt: Cunga kandi wohereze impamyabumenyi zawe zemejwe

empty.title: Nta mpamyabumenyi yabonetse
empty.description: Komeza ugire umwete ubashe kubona impamyabumenyi yawe ya Usafi!
empty.description_alt: Soza amasomo yawe kandi utsinde neza kugira ngo ubone impamyabumenyi z'umwuga zemejwe.

inclusion.title: Amahugurwa kuri bose, akazi kuri bose
inclusion.subtitle: Ubwitange mu guhuza n'ubufasha bwihariye
inclusion.description: Usafi Barista Training Center yemera ko icyifuzo cyo kumenya kawa kitagira imipaka. Twiyemeje kubaka ahantu hadaheza no gukora algorithm y'amasomo yacu mu buryo bufasha buri wese, harimo n'abafite ubumuga, kugira ngo bagerere ku ntego zabo.

hearing.title: Ku banyeshuri batumva kandi batavuga
list: Inyigisho z'amashusho: Kwibanda ku kwerekana ibikorwa, inyandiko zerekana intambwe ku yindi, n'ibishushanyo bisobanitse.
Ibikoresho by'itumanaho: Gukoresha intaho, tableti, n'inyandiko mu gusubiza ibibazo.
Gufashanya n'abandi: Gukorana n'abanyeshuri bumva kugira ngo bunganirane.

mobility.title: Ku bafite ubumuga bw'ingingo
list: Imitunganyirize y'ahantu: Inama ku bikoresho n'ahantu hukora (urugero: ameza agufi).
Umutekano imbere: Gufashwa mu bintu biremereye cyangwa gusukura imashini.

service.title: Amahugurwa kuri serivisi idaheza
service.description: Ikintu cy'ingenzi mu mahugurwa yacu ni ukumenya ko buri muntu wize muri Usafi ashobora gufasha buri mukiriya wese.

ordering.title: Gutaka itambiro
ordering.description: Kwigisha uburyo bwo gukoresha tableti cyangwa inyandiko mu kwakira abakiriya batumva cyangwa batavuga.

etiquette.title: Imyitwarire kuri serivisi
etiquette.description: Kwigisha uko umuntu agomba kubaha no kuvugana n'abantu bafite ubumuga butandukanye.

awareness.title: Gufata neza ahantu hagendwa
awareness.description: Gusobanukirwa imiterere y'aho kawa ikorerwa, intebe, n'ibikoresho bigenewe abafite ubumuga.

consultation.title: Tuganire ku byo ukeneye
consultation.description: Turashishikariza abanyeshuri bifuza kwiga kubanza kuvugana n'umuyobozi wacu, Sandrine Gasarasi, mbere yo kwiyandikisha. Ibi bidufasha gusobanukirwa n'ibyo ukeneye kugira ngo tugutegurire aho uzigira neza.

enrollment.title: Saba kwiga ubu: Bika umwanya wawe
enrollment.subtitle: Injira muri Usafi Barista Training Center
enrollment.description: Fungura konti y'umunyeshuri maze wuzuze fomu. Umaze kuyohereza, izasuzumwa kugira ngo wemererwe.

password.label: Ijambo ry'ibanga
password.hint: Iri jambo ry'ibanga naryo uzarikoresha winjira muri portal y'abanyeshuri.

errors.email_in_use: Iyi imeyili isanzwe ifite konti. Mwagerageza kwinjira.
errors.weak_password: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba rifite inyuguti 6 nibura.

payment.title: Ibijyanye no kwishyura
payment.description: Kwiyandikisha kwemezwa iyo wishyuye. Twemera uburyo bukurikira:

momo.title: Mobile Money
momo.description: Amakuru yabyo uyahabwa umaze kuzuza fomu.

bank.title: Kuri Banki
bank.description: Amakuru ya konti ya banki uyahabwa umaze kuzuza fomu.

flexibility.title: Kwishyura mu byiciro
flexibility.description: Twemerera abanyeshuri kwishyura mu byiciro bibiri cyangwa bitatu bikurikije amasezerano yacu. Amakuru arambuye uyoherezwa kuri imeyili umaze kwiyandikisha.

policy.title: Icyitonderwa
policy.subtext: (All tuition fees paid are strictly non-refundable.)
policy.details: Nyamuneka menya neza ko witeguye kwiga no gukoresha uburyo wahisemo mbere yo kwishyura.

gallery.title: Umuryango wa Usafi mu bikorwa
gallery.subtitle: Amafoto na Video by'amahugurwa
gallery.description: Irebere uburyo abanyeshuri bigira mu bikorwa muri Usafi Barista Training Center. Aya mafoto agaragaza umuhate, ubushake, n'ubwitange hagati y'abanyeshuri n'abarimu.

clip1.title: Ubuzima bwa buri munsi muri Usafi

clip3.title: Ibiganiro n'abanyeshuri
clip3.desc: Ibitekerezo ku isomo bakunze kurusha ayandi.

cta.title: Iyo mbonano n-iy'amaso
cta.description: Sura ishuri ryacu Rubangura Plaza kugira ngo wibonere uko twigisha.

equipment.title: Ibikoresho bikwiye mu mugambi ukwiye
equipment.subtitle: Ibikoresho by'ibanze ukeneye mu kazi kawe ka kinyamwuga
equipment.description: Gutangira ubucuruzi bwa kawa bisaba ibirenze ubushake, bisaba ibikoresho bikwiye. Iyi mbonerahamwe ikubiyemo ibikoresho by'ibanze bikenewe kugira ngo ubashe gukora neza, ubashe gukora kawa nziza itandukanye, waba utangiye café nini cyangwa akasitand ka espresso koroheje.

espresso.title: Imashini ya Espresso
espresso.subtitle: Umutima w'ubucuruzi bwawe.
espresso.description: Hitamo imashini ihuye n'ingano y'abakiriya uzafite. Imashini yizewe itanga amashanyarazi n'ubushyuhe buhwanye bwo gukora espresso nziza igihe cyose.

grinder.title: Imashini isya kawa
grinder.subtitle: N'ingenzi nk'imashini nyirizina.
grinder.description: Imashini isya neza ituma kawa isywa mu rugero ruri ku rwego rumwe. Iyo isywe nabi bituma kawa itaryoha neza kandi igapfusha ubusa ibishyimbo byayo.

tamper.title: Tamper
tamper.description: Ishawe kugira ngo ubashe gutsimba kawa neza mu buryo buri ku rugero rumwe. Tamper ifite amaseti niyo yizewe.

pitcher.title: Milk Pitcher
pitcher.description: Udukoresho tw'icyuma (stainless steel) ukeneye mu gukonjesha amata. Ugomba kugira utunini n'ututo dukurikije ibinyobwa ugiye gukora.

knock.title: Knock Box
knock.description: Icyenewe mu guta amasasari ya kawa usukuye. Igomba kuba ikozwe mu cyuma cyangwa raba kandi yoroshye kuyisukura.

scales.title: Digital Scales
scales.description: Ubuziranenge biterwa n'ingano. Izi mborerahamwe zifasha gupima inyuma (dose) n'ingano y'icyasohotse (yield) mu buryo bwiza.

cups.title: Ibikombe n'ibirahuri
cups.description: Ibikombe by'ibumba ku banywera mu kigo. Ibirahuri bito bya espresso. Ibikombe bya takeaway byizewe.

storage.title: Gubika kawa
storage.description: Ibikoresho bifunga neza kandi bitinjiramo umwuka biba bifasha kawa kuguma ifite uburyohe bwayo.

pos.title: Point of Sale (POS)
pos.description: Sisitemu ukeneye mu gucunga ibyatanzwe, kubona uko ubucuruzi bugenda, no kwakira ubwishyu.

kit.title: Ibikoresho by'isuku
kit.description: Igikoresho ukeneye kugira ngo usukure imashini buri munsi (backwashing) no gusukura steam wand.

agents.title: Ibirungo by'isuku
agents.description: Ugomba gukoresha imiti yagenewe isuku y'imashini nyamuneka kandi itangiza ubuzima bw'abantu.

gear.title: Imyambarire n'umutekano
gear.description: First aid kit igomba kuba ihari hafi. Imikeka (mats) ituma abantu banyerera inyuma ya bari.

pricing.title: Ibiciro n'aho wabikura
pricing.description: Ibiciro biterwa n'icyo ushaka, ubudahangarwa, n'icyo urimo gushaka. Dore ibyo wateganya nka bije yawe mu gutangira:

advice.title: Inama ku bijyanye n'aho wabikura:
advice.description: Ushobora gutangira ukoresha ibikoresho byakoze ariko byiza (refurbished) kugira ngo ubashe gucunga bije yawe. Duha abanyeshuri urutonde rw'abacuruzi bizewe mu Rwanda no mu mahanga.

pricing.cta_sub: Iga uko wapanga ubucuruzi, uburyo bwo kugura ibikoresho n'uko wabara amafaranga mu mutwe w'isomo rya 'Business Class'.

blog.title: Amakuru ya Usafi
blog.subtitle: Ahantu wakura inama kuri kawa, amakuru y'umwuga, n'inama z'ubucuruzi
blog.description: Blog ya Usafi ni ahantu ubumenyi n'ubugeni bwa kawa bihura. Komeza umenye ibigezweho mu isi ya kawa, ubumenyi buzagufasha mu mwuga wawe, n'inama zagufasha mu rugendo rwawe rw'ubucuruzi.

posts.empty: Nta makuru aboneka muri iki kiciro.

p1.title: Ibanga ryo gukora ifuro rinoze (Micro-foam)
p1.snippet: Kumenya neza uburyo bwo gushyushya amata nibyo bituma ubashe gushushanya (latte art) neza ku kawa.

p2.title: Inama z'ingenzi mu gutangira café yawe ya mbere
p2.snippet: Kuva ku guhitamo ahantu heza kugeza ku gushyiraho ibiciro, dore inkingi 5 ukeneye kugira ngo utangire neza.

p3.title: Promotion iheruka muri Usafi
p3.snippet: Twishimira umuhate n'intego zagezweho n'abanyeshuri basoje amasomo mu cyiciro cya 12.

p4.title: Uburyo watsinda ikizamini cyo gushaka akazi nka Barista
p4.snippet: Kwireberera, isuku, n'ubumenyi kuri kawa. Dore ibyo abakoresha bareba mbere y'ibindi.

newsletter.title: Ntucikwe n'andi makuru!
newsletter.description: Iyandikishe kuri amakuru ya Usafi kugira ngo ubone inama zishya n'amakuru y'akazi kuri imeyili yawe.

testimonials.title: Inkuru z'Insinzi
testimonials.subtitle: Umva ibyo abanyeshuri bacu bavuga
testimonials.description: Urugero rwiza rw-imiterere y'inyigisho zacu ni intsinzi y'abanyeshuri bacu barangije. Soma cyangwa urebe video zerekana uburyo Usafi Barista Training Center yafashije guhindura inzozi mo umwuga uhesha amafaranga, mu gufasha abanyeshuri kubona akazi mu mahoteli akomeye cyangwa kwitangirira ubucuruzi bwabo.

featured.title: Kuva ku munyeshuri kugeza kubaye nyir'ubucuruzi: Inkuru ya Alex
featured.description: Alex arasangiza uburyo isomo rya Business ryahaye umubare w'uburyo bwo gutangira café ye mu mezi 6 gusa amaze gusoza amasomo.

grace.text: "Mbere yo kuza muri Usafi ntabwo nari nzi ubumenyi bwa kawa. Nyuma yo kwigira mu kigo (on-site), nagize icyizere cyo gusaba kwimenyereza akazi. Usafi yanyohereje muri hoteli imwe bakorana, bahita banyandika mu kazi nyuma y'amezi abiri. Ubufasha mu mwuga bwanyongereye icyizere."
grace.name: Nyamwiza Aidah

kevin.text: "Uburyo banyigishije gukora espresso no gutegura amata byari bitangaje. Ubu nshobora gukora ikawa nziza buri gihe, kandi n'abakiriya barabishima. Ubumenyi bwanjye muri Latte Art butuma mberwa n'abandi benshi bahatanira akazi."
kevin.name: Umwali Ratifa

patience.text: "Nasoje amasomo kuri interineti mu gihe nari mfite akazi k'ijoro. Video n'inyandiko muri PDF banyeretse byatumye nshobora kwitangira inyigisho mu gihe cyanjye. Ndasaba buri wese ushaka kwiga ariko akaba afite akazi kenshi kugana Usafi."
patience.name: Munyaneza Eric

thankyou.title: Iyandikisha ryakiriwe!
thankyou.description: Murakoze kwiyandikisha muri Usafi Barista Training Center. Twayonereje imeyili irimo amakuru y'uburyo bwo kwishyura n'ikindi ugomba gukora.

newsletter.title: Iyandikishe ku makuru yacu
newsletter.subtitle: Komeza umenye amakuru mashya, ibigezweho n'amahirwe.

search.type_to_begin: Andika nibura inyuguti 2 kugira ngo ushakishe

dashboard.subtitle: Witeguye gukora kawa nziza uyu munsi ?

courses.locked_note: Vugana n'umwarimu kugira ngo uguhe kwinjira

course_view.study_path_desc: Hitamo uburyo wifuza kwigamo ibikubiyemo muri iri somo.
course_view.full_notes_desc: Ibikubiyemo byose birambuye hamwe n'amafoto n'ubumenyi bwimbitse mu bya tekiniki.
course_view.summary_notes_desc: Incacake yibanda ku bumenyi bw'ibanze n'ingenzi ugomba kugumana mu mutwe mu gihe gito.

anti_cheat.unload_warning: Kuva kuri iyi mbuga biratuma ikizamini cyohera. Umeze neza ?
anti_cheat.visibility_warning: Isi: Ikizamini cyoherejwe kuko wavuye kuri iyi paji.

quiz.title: Ikizamini cy'Ubumenyi
quiz.subtitle: Nyamuneka kurikiza amategeko akurikira
quiz.matching_instruction: Huza ibintu binyuze mu kubishyira mu mwanya ukwiye

timer.title: Igihe Kigenewe
timer.desc: Buri kibazo gifite igihe cyacyo. Iyo igihe kirangiye kibahita cyoherezwa.

pass_mark.title: Amanota asabwa
pass_mark.desc: Ugomba kubona nibura {{passMark}}% kugira ngo ukomeze isomo rikurikira.

anti_cheat.title: Amategeko y'Ingenzura
anti_cheat.desc: Kuva kuri iyi paji, kureba indi paji, cyangwa kuyivugurura bituma ikizamini cyoherezwa ako kanya.

passed.title: Watsinze neza
passed.desc: Byagenze neza cyane. Umenye neza iri somo. Ushobora gukomeza isomo rikurikira.

failed.title: Ntabwo watsinze
failed.desc: Amanota wabonye ari munsi y'asabwa. Ugomba gusubiramo isomo mbere yo kongera gukora ikizamini.

certificate_design.title: Impamyabumenyi
certificate_design.disclaimer: Iyi mpamyabumenyi yemeza ko umunyeshuri yujuje ibisabwa byose na Usafi Barista Training Center.

print.footer_text: Ishuri rya Barista rya Usafi • Ishami ry'Umwuga

dashboard.student_pulse: Dore amakuru y'abanyeshuri bawe uyu munsi.

business.title: Gucunga ubucuruzi bwa kawa
business.description: Ku banyeshuri bashaka kwitangirira ubucuruzi, uyu mutwe uha abanyeshuri ubumenyi bw'ibanze bwo guhindura icyerekezo cyabo impamo.
business.approval_pending_desc: Konte yawe iracyasuzumwa n'umuyobozi. Uzashobora kwinjira mu masomo y'ubucuruzi umaze kwemerwa.

forum.no_posts: Nta ngingo zo kuganira ziriho. Tangira imwe!
forum.discussion_placeholder: Sangiza ibitekerezo byawe, resept cyangwa ikibazo hano. Sobanura neza!
forum.no_comments: Nta cyiyumviro kiriho. Wowe ubanza gusubiza!

chat.no_chats: Icumye mu murongo. Tangira ikiganiro cy'ingenzi.
chat.no_cohort: Nta banyeshuri bo mu itsinda babonetse kugirango muvugane.
chat.no_classmates: Nta bandi banyeshuri bakora babonetse kugirango muvugane.

change_password.title: Guhindura ijambo ry'ibanga
change_password.err_too_short: Ijambo ry'ibanga rishya rigomba kugira inyuguti nibura 6
change_password.err_same: Ijambo ry'ibanga rishya rigomba kuba ryanditse bitandukanye n'irya none
change_password.err_no_user: Nta mukoresha winjiye mu buryo buzwi
change_password.err_wrong_password: Ijambo ry'ibanga rya none si ryo

privacy_settings.title: Ibanga & Uburenganzira
privacy_settings.subtitle: Cunga kugaragara kwawe kandi urinde imikoranire yawe
privacy_settings.email_desc: Emerera abandi kubona aho bakura contact yawe
privacy_settings.messages_desc: Akira ubutumwa buvuye ku bandi bakoresha
privacy_settings.sharing_desc: Sangira amakuru adasobanutse ku bw'iterambere rya sisitemu
privacy_settings.info_desc: Ntabwo tujya tugurisha amakuru yawe. Sura <link>Amategeko y'Ibanga</link> kugira ngo umenye byinshi ku buryo turinda amakuru yawe.
privacy_settings.error: Ntabwo bishoboye kubika ibigenamiterere. Ongera ugerageze.
